name: MUDE
description:
MUDE.

The world has gone to dirt and CRT televisions are needed.

Make sure you have correct symbols displayed on the TVs or you won't get through the checkpoint gates.

"Where are the TVs needed?", you ask. We don't know.

"Why do I have to arrange them based on the symbols?", you ask. We don't know.

You might also ask,

"What's up with his face?"

Or

"Why is there a bag?"

Or

"Why are there rings on his legs?"

We don't know.

But make sure those TVs get delivered.

Art by Arhi.
Other stuff by famer.
Sound assets from freesound.org
